teks_text: Reading/Fluency. Students read grade-level text with fluency and comprehension. Students are expected to read aloud grade-level stories with fluency (rate, accuracy, expression, appropriate phrasing) and comprehension.
aware_text: read aloud grade-level stories with fluency (rate, accuracy, expression, appropriate phrasing) and comprehension.

reporting_category: Reading/Comprehension of Informational Text/Culture and History
teks_text: Reading/Comprehension of Informational Text/Culture and History. Students analyze, make inferences and draw conclusions about the author's purpose in cultural, historical, and contemporary contexts and provide evidence from the text to support their understanding. Students are expected to draw conclusions from the information presented by an author and evaluate how well the author's purpose was achieved.
aware_text: draw conclusions from the information presented by an author and evaluate how well the author's purpose was achieved.

aware_text: summarize the main ideas and supporting details in a text in ways that maintain meaning and logical order.

aware_text: determine the facts in text and verify them through established methods.
